channel.title: Help with webclient
channel.description:
Ok well im trying to make a webclient. I have the auto cache downloader working fine and I have jarred it but these are the things I need to do that I dunno how-
1. Upload my cache for the auto downloader to download from (www.mywebsite.com/cache?. Dunno how to do that) 2. Same thing as #1 but instead I need a link for the client.jar so I can advertise on rs-ps.org 3. The code for the webclient? 4. Where should I upload it?
Rep++ for anyone who can help me with 2 or more of these things.

item.title: Help with webclient
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

Ok well im trying to make a webclient. I have the auto cache downloader working fine and I have jarred it but these are the things I need to do that I dunno how-

  1. Upload my cache for the auto downloader to download from (www.mywebsite.com/cache?. Dunno how to do that)
  2. Same thing as #1 but instead I need a link for the client.jar so I can advertise on rs-ps.org
  3. The code for the webclient?
  4. Where should I upload it?

Rep++ for anyone who can help me with 2 or more of these things.

Read full topic
